bug.author: venkateshkrc
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Starting Streamlit results in script execution error. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Install Streamlit Run Streamlit using 'streamlit hello'
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Normal startup <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2994809/67062622-ce503300-f19e-11e9-8085-d5930e2812b6.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
No <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.48.1 Python version: 3.7 64-bit OS version: Windows 10 Pro. OS Locale: Japanese Browser version: Google Chrome 77.0.3865.120 64-bit
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
